addresses.isPhoneMandatory.title: Require a phone number with addresses
addresses.isPhoneMandatory.description: Check this box to make it mandatory to include a phone number when saving an address in My Account pages.

layout.colorPalette.title: Color Palettes
layout.colorPalette.description:
Color palettes maps a color defined in a netsuite list to a CSS color value. Then, one or more color can use a palette to show the values.
Use this table to modify default color palette or create new ones.
IMPORTANT:

paletteId.title: Palette id
paletteId.description: The palette id for this color

colorName.title: Color name
colorName.description: The color name as it is in the netsuite list used in the declaration.

colorValue.title: Color value
colorValue.description: The color CSS value - must be a valid CSS color.

imgheight.title: Image Height
imgheight.description: Heigh with its unit of the specified image.

imgwidth.title: Image Width
imgwidth.description: Width with its unit of the specified image.

layout.lightColors.title: Light colors
layout.lightColors.description: The light colors in the color palette

imageNotAvailable.title: Image Not Available url
imageNotAvailable.description: Enter the URL to the default image displayed when an item image is not configured.

imageSizeMapping.title: Image Resize
imageSizeMapping.description:
Here you can control the image-resize service values (website record). These are the current sizes used in SCA:
  • thumbnail: 175 * 175 - used in the search results
  • main: 600 * 600 - used as main image in the PDP
  • tinythumb: 50 * 50 - used as the tiny thumbs in the PDP's image gallery
  • zoom: 1200 * 1200 - used in the PDP's zommed image
  • fullscreen: 1600 * 1600
  • homeslider: 200 * 220
  • homecell: 125 * 125

id.title: size
id.description: The image size name used in the application

value.title: value
value.description: Corresponding value given in the website record configuration

bronto.adapterUrl.title: Adapter URL
bronto.adapterUrl.description: Enter the URL of the Bronto adapter.

group.title: Shopping Catalog
group.description: Commerce Catalog - search. pdp, facets, etc

addToCartBehavior.title: Add to cart behavior
addToCartBehavior.description: Choose the action that occurs when the user adds an item to the cart.

addToCartFromFacetsView.title: Add to Cart from Facets View
addToCartFromFacetsView.description: Check this box to display an Add to Cart button on each search result.

promocodes.allowMultiples.title: Allow adding more than one promocode
promocodes.allowMultiples.description: Check this box to enable stackable promotions on your SCA site.

matrixchilditems.enabled.title: Allow custom matrix child search in the item list
matrixchilditems.enabled.description: Check this box to enable the custom matrix child item search within the Item list.

matrixchilditems.fieldset.title: Matrix child items fieldset for search
matrixchilditems.fieldset.description: Enter the fieldset used on the matrix item child search.

showTaxDetailsPerLine.title: If the information is available to your country, shows detailed taxes in the cart (per line) and Purchase History
showTaxDetailsPerLine.description: If the information is available to your country, check this box to show the per-line tax details in the Cart and purchase history.

summaryTaxLabel.title: Tax-type label
summaryTaxLabel.description: Select the tax-type label to display in the Cart's Order Summary.

cases.defaultValues.statusStart.id.title: Status start id
cases.defaultValues.statusStart.id.description: Enter the NetSuite case status used to indicate that a case has been started.

cases.defaultValues.statusClose.id.title: Status close id
cases.defaultValues.statusClose.id.description: Enter the NetSuite case status used to indicate that a case has been closed.

cases.defaultValues.origin.id.title: Origin id
cases.defaultValues.origin.id.description: Enter the internal identifier of the case origin.

categories.menuLevel.title: Category navigation menu level deepness
categories.menuLevel.description: Enter the number of levels of the category hierarchy to show in the Categories navigation menu.

categories.addToNavigationTabs.title: Show Categories navigation menu
categories.addToNavigationTabs.description: Check this box to enable the Categories navigation menu.

categories.sideMenu.sortBy.title: Side menu > sort by
categories.sideMenu.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field in the Categories sidebar.

categories.sideMenu.additionalFields.title: Side menu > additional fields
categories.sideMenu.additionalFields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the application for the side menu.

categories.sideMenu.uncollapsible.title: Side menu > collapsible
categories.sideMenu.uncollapsible.description: Check this box to make the Categories side menu collapsible and expandable.

categories.sideMenu.showMax.title: Side menu > showMax
categories.sideMenu.showMax.description: Enter the maximum number of categories to show in the list before displaying a Show More link.

categories.sideMenu.collapsed.title: Side menu > collapsed
categories.sideMenu.collapsed.description: Check this box to make the Categories side menu appear collased when the page is loaded.

categories.subCategories.sortBy.title: Sub categories > sort by
categories.subCategories.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field for sub categories.

categories.subCategories.fields.title: Sub categories > additional fields
categories.subCategories.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the application for sub categories.

categories.category.fields.title: category fields
categories.category.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list of category fields. Category Fields are the fields that appear in the Category page.

categories.breadcrumb.fields.title: breadcrumb fields
categories.breadcrumb.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the breadcrumb navigation.

categories.menu.sortBy.title: menu > sort by
categories.menu.sortBy.description: Enter the Category record field to act as the primary sort field in the Navigation menu.

categories.menu.fields.title: menu fields
categories.menu.fields.description: Multi-select any additional fields to be added to the default list returned by the ItemSearch API for use in the Navigation menu.

subtab.title: Forms
subtab.description: Checkout configuration related to web forms.

checkoutApp.skipLogin.title: Skip Checkout Login
checkoutApp.skipLogin.description: Check this box to enable anonymous users to skip the login/register page when they navigate to Checkout.

isMultiShippingEnabled.title: Enable Multiple Shipping
isMultiShippingEnabled.description: Check this box to let users specify multiple shipping addresses for an order.

removePaypalAddress.title: Remove Paypal Addresses
removePaypalAddress.description: Check this box to remove PayPal addresses from the NetSuite record after placing the order as they are not valid NetSuite records.

useStandardHeaderFooter.title: Use standard header and footer
useStandardHeaderFooter.description: Check this box to use standard header and footer in Checkout process.

isThreeDSecureEnabled.title: Enable 3D Secure payments
isThreeDSecureEnabled.description: Check this box to enable 3D Secure payments for your site.

checkoutApp.checkoutSteps.title: Checkout Steps
checkoutApp.checkoutSteps.description: Choose an option to specify the checkout steps configuration of the Checkout application.

checkoutApp.paypalLogo.title: PayPal logo url
checkoutApp.paypalLogo.description: Enter the URL of the PayPal logo. SuiteCommerce Advanced displays this logo in the check out process.

checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.title: Invoice Terms and Conditions
checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.description: Enter the text of the invoice terms and conditions in HTML format.
checkoutApp.invoiceTermsAndConditions.default:
Invoice Terms and Conditions

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

autoPopulateNameAndEmail.title: Auto populate name and email
autoPopulateNameAndEmail.description: Check this box to enable auto-population of a guest shopper’s name and email in any forms during checkout. If this box is unchecked, no fields will populate automatically.

forms.loginAsGuest.showName.title: Login as guest, show name
forms.loginAsGuest.showName.description: Check this box to show first and last name input fields when a user registers as a guest. If Auto Populate Name and Email is enabled, these names will be required and automatically populate throughout the checkout process where applicable. If unchecked, no fields populate automatically.

forms.loginAsGuest.showEmail.title: Login as guest, show email
forms.loginAsGuest.showEmail.description: Check this box to show email address input fields when a user registers as a guest. If Auto Populate Name and Email is enabled, this address will be required and automatically populate throughout the checkout process where applicable. If unchecked, no fields populate automatically.

forms.address.showAddressLineTwo.title: Show address line 2
forms.address.showAddressLineTwo.description: Check this box to display a secondary address line during checkout.

subtab.title: Site Management Tools
subtab.description: CMS - Content Management System by CXM

cms.useCMS.title: Use Site Management Tools
cms.useCMS.description: Check this box to enable Site Management Tools integration in SuiteCommerce Advanced.

cms.escToLoginDisabled.title: Disable ESC key to login
cms.escToLoginDisabled.description: Check this box to disable the Escape to Login to CMS feature. Instead, access the CMS Administrator using http://my.webstore/cms/2/admin/cms.jsp.

cms.baseUrl.title: Landing Pages URL
cms.baseUrl.description: Specify the base URL, consisting of the protocol + hostname, for accessing landing pages. For example, enter https://system.sandbox.netsuite.com when working in a sandbox account. Leave the field blank to access landing pages on the production account.

cms.adapterVersion.title: CMS Adapter Version
cms.adapterVersion.description: Select the CMS Adapter version to be used by the domain. Please read NetSuite Help to make sure you have followed all the mandatory steps before moving between versions.

defaultSearchUrl.title: Default search url
defaultSearchUrl.description: Enter the the default search URL.

searchApiMasterOptions.title: Search API Fieldsets
searchApiMasterOptions.description: Options to be passed when querying the Items Search API

defaultPaginationSettings.showPageList.title: Desktop > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettings.showPageList.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettings.pagesToShow.title: Desktop > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettings.pagesToShow.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettings.showPageIndica.title: Desktop > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettings.showPageIndica.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on desktop browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageL.title: Phone > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageL.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.pagesToSh.title: Phone > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.pagesToSh.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageI.title: Phone > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettingsPhone.showPageI.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on phone browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.title: Tablet > Show page list
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.description: Check this box to display  the Page List on tablet browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.pagesToS.title: Tablet > Pages to show
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.pagesToS.description: Enter the maximum number of pages to display in the page list on tablet browsers.

defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.title: Tablet > Show page indicator
defaultPaginationSettingsTablet.showPage.description: Check this box to display a current page indicator in the page list on tablet browsers.

subtab.title: Payment Methods
subtab.description: Payment methods related settings like Credit Card configuration, payment method regex, etc

paymentmethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentmethods.description: Map of payment methods, please update the keys using your account setup information.

key.title: key
key.description: This number should match the property 'key' of the objects returned by the following JavaScript call (run it in the Browser Console): 'SC.ENVIRONMENT.siteSettings.paymentmethods' . You can edit/add new payment methods going to Setup-> Accounting -> Accounting Lists - filter by 'Payment Method'.

regex.title: regex
regex.description: The regex to match the payment method number

description.title: description
description.description: Some words about the payment method for documentation purposes only

default.description: This company allows both private individuals and businesses to accept payments over the Internet

cookieWarningBanner.closable.title: User may dismiss banner
cookieWarningBanner.closable.description: Check this box to let users close the cookie warning banner.

cookieWarningBanner.saveInCookie.title: Save in cookie
cookieWarningBanner.saveInCookie.description: Check this box to save the value of the User May Dismiss Banner property is stored in a browser cookie.

cookieWarningBanner.anchorText.title: Anchor text
cookieWarningBanner.anchorText.description: Enter the text used in the link to a modal dialog whose content is defined in the Message property.

cookieWarningBanner.message.title: message
cookieWarningBanner.message.description: Enter the text of the modal dialog. This text is displayed when the user clicks the link defined in the Anchor Text property.
cookieWarningBanner.message.default: To provide a better shopping experience, our website uses cookies. Continuing use of the site implies consent.

subtab.title: Credit Card
subtab.description: Payment methods related settings like Credit Card configuration, payment method regex, etc

creditCard.showCreditCardHelp.title: Show Credit Card help
creditCard.showCreditCardHelp.description: Check this box to enable help text for finding a credit card security code.

creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.title: Credit Card help title
creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.description: The text to show as the title of the help
creditCard.creditCardHelpTitle.default: Enter the 3- or 4-digit Card Security Code. The placement of this number depends on the credit card provider, as shown below.

creditCard.imageCvvAllCards.title: CVV All cards image
creditCard.imageCvvAllCards.description: Enter the URL of the image showing the card verification value (CVV) number on credit cards. This image displays a number located on the back of the credit card.

creditCard.imageCvvAmericanCard.title: CVV American card image
creditCard.imageCvvAmericanCard.description: Enter the URL for the image showing the card verification value (CVV) number on American credit cards. This image shows a number located on the front of the credit card.

creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.title: Credit Card secure info
creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.description: Enter security-related text to be displayed in the user interface.
creditCard.creditCardShowSecureInfo.default: We take all reasonable steps to protect our customers personal information against loss, misuse and alteration. We use encryption technology whenever receiving and transferring your personal information on our site. When you are viewing a page that is requesting personal information, the URL in the address bar at top of your browser will start with "https". This indicates your transaction session is secured through Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). If the web page you are viewing does not start with "https", please contact us.

facetsAsUrlParameters.title: Facets as URL Parameters
facetsAsUrlParameters.description: Check this box to treat all facets as URL query string parameters to help optimize searches. Otherwise, all facets will be part of the URL path unless something else is specified in the individual Facet record.

id.title: item field id
id.description: Netsuite item field id, something like 'custitem31'

name.title: Name
name.description: Label for this facet in the UI

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: A integer grater than zero indicating for ordering facets editors in the catalog browser. Facets with greater priority numbers will appear above others.

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.description: behavior can be one of 'range', 'multi'. If 'range', a double slider will be showed as the editor. If 'multi', multiple facet value selection will be available

template.title: Template
template.description: The template used to render this facet editor, some available are item_color and item_range

colors.title: Color Palette
colors.description: For those facets editors that shows color, please indicate which color palette to use to show the colors defined in ns lists

collapsed.title: Collapsed
collapsed.description: If true it will be collapsed in the UI - the user can uncollapse it manually if needed

uncollapsible.title: Non Collapsible
uncollapsible.description: If true the user won't be able to collapse the facet editor

showHeading.title: Show Heading
showHeading.description: if false the heading of the facet editor won't be shown

titleToken.title: Title Format
titleToken.description: format for the facet on the document title's when it is selected. Can be a string like 'from $(0) to $(1)' for range behaviour or 'foo $(0) bar' for others. Also it can be a function that accept the facet object as the one parameter.

titleSeparator.title: Title Separator
titleSeparator.description: Separator between facets in the document's title

parser.title: Parser
parser.description: The function that shows the value in the UI, use 'default' if not sure. Js Code: Facets.js > facetConfigTranslators

isParameter.title: Is URL Parameter?
isParameter.description: If true, the facet will interpreted as an URL query string parameter. If false, the facet will be part of the URL path. It will take precendence over the Facets as URL Parameters property.

max.title: Max
max.description: For multi select facets, it will limit the number of options and show a "See more". Particularly useful for B2B - or facets with lots of options

subtab.title: Facets Delimiters
subtab.description: Facets SEO Limits.  Limits for the SEO generated links in the facets browser. Once the limits are hitted the url is replaced with # in the links

facetDelimiters.betweenFacetNameAndValue.title: Between facet name and value
facetDelimiters.betweenFacetNameAndValue.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between the facet name and value.

facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentFacets.title: Between different facets
facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentFacets.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between the different facets.

facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentFacetsVa.title: Between different facets values
facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentFacetsVa.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between the different facet values.

facetDelimiters.betweenRangeFacetsValues.title: Between range facets values
facetDelimiters.betweenRangeFacetsValues.description: Add a character to appear in the URL and delimit facet ranges.

facetDelimiters.betweenFacetsAndOptions.title: Between facets and options
facetDelimiters.betweenFacetsAndOptions.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between the different facet and its options.

facetDelimiters.betweenOptionNameAndValu.title: Between option name and value
facetDelimiters.betweenOptionNameAndValu.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between the option name and its value.

facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentOptions.title: Between different options
facetDelimiters.betweenDifferentOptions.description: Add a character to appear in the URL between two options.

facetsSeoLimits.numberOfFacetsGroups.title: Number of Facets groups
facetsSeoLimits.numberOfFacetsGroups.description: Enter a number to specify how many facet groups are indexed.

facetsSeoLimits.numberOfFacetsValues.title: Number of Facets Values
facetsSeoLimits.numberOfFacetsValues.description: Enter a number to specify how many multi-facet groups are grouped together.

facetsSeoLimits.options.title: Options
facetsSeoLimits.options.description: Multi-select which URL options are indexed. If an option is not included here, it is not indexed when appearing in a URL.

itemsDisplayOptions.title: Desktop
itemsDisplayOptions.description: Available views for the item list by selecting the templates

id.title: id
id.description: The id for this display option

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

template.title: template
template.description: Template to use in the results of this option

columns.title: columns
columns.description: Number of columns to show in this result list

icon.title: icon
icon.description: Icon to use in the UI for this option

itemsDisplayOptionsPhone.title: Phone
itemsDisplayOptionsPhone.description: Available views for the item list by selecting the templates

id.title: id
id.description: The id for this display option

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

template.title: template
template.description: Template to use in the results of this option

columns.title: columns
columns.description: Number of columns to show in this result list

icon.title: icon
icon.description: Icon to use in the UI for this option

itemsDisplayOptionsTablet.title: Tablet
itemsDisplayOptionsTablet.description: Available views for the item list by selecting the templates

id.title: id
id.description: The id for this display option

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

template.title: template
template.description: Template to use in the results of this option

columns.title: columns
columns.description: Number of columns to show in this result list

icon.title: icon
icon.description: Icon to use in the UI for this option

defaultSearchTitle.title: Search results title
defaultSearchTitle.description: Enter the title for the facet browse view that appears in the application header.

searchPrefs.maxLength.title: Search Keyword Max Length
searchPrefs.maxLength.description: Enter the maximum number of characters the user can enter in the search field.

resultsPerPage.title: Search Results per page
resultsPerPage.description: Available options for the Results per Page dropdown

items.title: items
items.description: Amount of items for this result option

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

sortOptions.title: Desktop
sortOptions.description: How the user can sort the search results, available sorting options for the Sort By dropdown

id.title: id
id.description: id has the format $field:$asc, examples : 'relevance:desc', 'onlinecustomerprice:asc', 'onlinecustomerprice:desc'. These ids must be configured in Setup Website > Search > Sort fields

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

isDefault.title: Is default
isDefault.description: Is default ? If true, it will be the active search sort option by default.

sortOptionsPhone.title: Phone
sortOptionsPhone.description: How the user can sort the search results, available sorting options for the Sort By dropdown

id.title: id
id.description: id has the format $field:$asc, examples : 'relevance:desc', 'onlinecustomerprice:asc', 'onlinecustomerprice:desc'. These ids must be configured in Setup Website > Search > Sort fields

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

isDefault.title: Is default
isDefault.description: Is default ? If true, it will be the active search sort option by default.

default.name: Sort by price, low to high
Sort by price, high to low

sortOptionsTablet.title: Tablet
sortOptionsTablet.description: How the user can sort the search results, available sorting options for the Sort By dropdown

id.title: id
id.description: id has the format $field:$asc, examples : 'relevance:desc', 'onlinecustomerprice:asc', 'onlinecustomerprice:desc'. These ids must be configured in Setup Website > Search > Sort fields

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this sort option.

isDefault.title: Is default
isDefault.description: Is default ? If true, it will be the active search sort option by default.

default.name: Sort by price, low to high
Sort by price, high to low

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.id.title: Google AdWords ID
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.id.description: Enter your Google AdWords ID. This value corresponds to the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.value.title: AdWords value
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.value.description: Enter the value you defined in the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.label.title: Google AdWords label
tracking.googleAdWordsConversion.label.description: Enter your Google AdWords label. This value corresponds to the conversion tag you created in your Google AdWords account.

tracking.googleTagManager.isMultiDomain.title: Is a multi-domain site?
tracking.googleTagManager.isMultiDomain.description: Check this box If it's a multi-domain site.

tracking.googleTagManager.id.title: Google Tag Manager ID
tracking.googleTagManager.id.description: Enter the value of the Google Tag Manager ID. Setting this property enables this feature on your SuiteCommerce Advanced site.

tracking.googleTagManager.dataLayerName.title: Google Tag Manager data name
tracking.googleTagManager.dataLayerName.description: Enter the data layer object that contains all of the information that you want to pass to Google Tag Manager.

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.proper.title: Google Universal Analytics ID
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.proper.description: Enter the Google Universal Analytics Tracking ID. SuiteCommerce Advanced inserts this property into each page of the application. To locate the tracking ID, login to your Google Analytics account and go to Admin > Property > Property Settings.

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.title: Google Universal Analytics domain
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.description: Enter the domain used for Google Universal Analytics. The value you enter depends on which application you want to use Google Universal Analytics

tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.title: Google Universal Analytics secure domain
tracking.googleUniversalAnalytics.domain.description: Enter the secure domain used for Google Universal Analytics. Possible values are the same as the Universal Analytics Domain property.

header.notShowCurrencySelector.title: Hide Currency Selector
header.notShowCurrencySelector.description: Check this box to hide the currency selector in the application.

header.logoUrl.title: Logo URL
header.logoUrl.description: Enter the URL location of the logo image file that is displayed at the top of the application.

transactionListColumns.invoiceOpen.title: Transaction list columns Open Invoices
transactionListColumns.invoiceOpen.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Billing > Invoices > Open.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: duedate, trandate, and amount.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.invoicePaid.title: Transaction list columns Paid Invoices
transactionListColumns.invoicePaid.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Billing > Invoices > Paid in Full.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: trandate, closedate, and amount.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableInvoice.title: Enable Invoices columns management
transactionListColumns.enableInvoice.description: Check this box to enable Invoice Columns Management.

subtab.title: Item Options
subtab.description: General configuration for all item options across the application

ItemOptions.showOnlyTheListedOptions.title: Show only items listed in: Item options and custom transaction column fields
ItemOptions.showOnlyTheListedOptions.description: Check this box to show only the fields listed in: "Item Options and Custom Transaction Column Fields" on your webstore.

ItemOptions.optionsConfiguration.title: Item options and custom transaction column fields
ItemOptions.optionsConfiguration.description:
Settings for displaying each of the item options in the Detailed Page. Each of the item options are objects that extend whats comming of the api. This options should have (but not limited to) these documented properties. We have provided some templates for you to use but you are encouraged to create your own:
For the selector we have created: item_views_option_color_tpl, item_views_option_text_tpl, item_views_option_tile_tpl, and for the selected we have created: item_views_selected_option_tpl, item_views_selected_option_color_tpl

cartOptionId.title: Cart Option Id
cartOptionId.description: The id of an option in the cart (!required, is the primary key for the mapping)

colors.title: Color Palette
colors.description: Use the Facets color palette for this

label.title: Label
label.description: The label that the option will be shown

urlParameterName.title: URL Parameter Name
urlParameterName.description: The key of the option when its stored in the url

useLabelsOnUrl.title: Use Labels on URL
useLabelsOnUrl.description: Indicate if this option should show the label's value when displayed in the URL or instead the internalid's value should be used (the second is the default)

index.title: Sort Index
index.description: Position in which the current option should be shown (default value 10)

templateSelector.title: Selector Template
templateSelector.description: the template that will be rendered for selecting the options (Item list and PDP)

showSelectorInList.title: Show option in item lists
showSelectorInList.description: true if this option will be show in the facet results

templateFacetCell.title: Facet Cell Template
templateFacetCell.description: the template that will be used to render options on facets

templateSelected.title: Selected Template
templateSelected.description: the template that will be rendered for the item in the cart (Cart and Cart confirmation)

listHeader.filterRangeQuantityDays.title: Filter range quantity days
listHeader.filterRangeQuantityDays.description: Enter the number of days within the date range used when displaying data.

subtab.title: Transaction List Columns
subtab.description: List of columns for each transaction list

transactionListColumns.orderHistory.title: Transaction list columns order history
transactionListColumns.orderHistory.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Purchases > Purchase History.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: date, amount, and status.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableOrderHistor.title: Enable order history columns management
transactionListColumns.enableOrderHistor.description: Check this box to enable Purchase History Columns Management.

subtab.title: Overview
subtab.description: Overview is the main view of My Account experience that shows the customer's credit cards, addresses, etc

overview.customerSupportURL.title: Customer Support URL
overview.customerSupportURL.description: Enter the URL for your customer support page.

overview.homeBanners.title: Home Banners
overview.homeBanners.description: If you configure here it will display it in the index of my account. Ideal for promotions for clients

overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.title: Recent Orders quantity to show
overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.description: Enter the quantity of recent orders displayed in the My Account Overview page.

cms.contentWait.title: Time to wait for CMS content (ms)
cms.contentWait.description: Enter the maximum time, in milliseconds, that SuiteCommerce waits for CMS content to render. If this maximum time is exceeded, the app renders then CMS content renders later. You might also have a flickering problem.

subtab.title: PickupInStore
subtab.description: Enable PickupInStore feature to allow customers to choose where to pick up their purchases.

isPickupInStoreEnabled.title: Enable Pickup in Store
isPickupInStoreEnabled.description: Check this box to let users buy items online and pickup in a nearby store.

pickupInStoreSalesOrderCustomFormId.title: Pickup in Store Sales Order Custom Form ID
pickupInStoreSalesOrderCustomFormId.description: Enter the Internal ID for the custom form that SCA uses to generate a sales order using the Pickup In Store feature.

productDetailsInformation.title: Product Details Information
productDetailsInformation.description: Details fields to be displayed on a stacked list on the PDP. Multiple item fields can be shown in sections.

name.title: Name
name.description: Label to use in the UI to reference this detail option.

contentFromKey.title: id
contentFromKey.description: Item record's field to show its value in this item detail section

itemprop.title: itemprop
itemprop.description: Optional. The name of the 'itemprop' schema.org HTML attribute.

ItemOptions.maximumOptionValuesQuantityW.title: Maximum Option Values quantity without Pusher
ItemOptions.maximumOptionValuesQuantityW.description: This number property indicates the maximum number of option values to appear in line on any mobile device's product details pages before displaying a pusher.

productline.multiImageOption.title: Multi-Image Option
productline.multiImageOption.description: Configure what are the item option fields that filter images

productList.additionEnabled.title: Enable modification by customers
productList.additionEnabled.description: Check this box to let users modify (add, edit, or delete) a private product list.

productList.loginRequired.title: Login Required
productList.loginRequired.description: Check this box to require users to be logged in to modify a product list.

productList.listTemplates.title: Lists Templates
productList.listTemplates.description: Predefined lists, a.k.a templates: Administrators can define predefined list of templates. New customers will have these template lists by default. This lists will be of type=predefined and they cannot be modified/deleted. Note: Associated record will be created only when the customer add some product to the list.

default.name: Saved for Later
default.description: This is for the cart saved for later items

default.name: Request a Quote
default.description: This is for the request a quote items

productList.templates.title: Display modalities for product list items
productList.templates.description: Display modalities for product list items

productReviews.maxFlagsCount.title: Max Flags Count
productReviews.maxFlagsCount.description: Enter the number of flags a review must receive before being marked as flagged by users.

productReviews.loginRequired.title: Login Required
productReviews.loginRequired.description: Check this box to require users to be logged in to create a review.

productReviews.flaggedStatus.title: Flagged Status
productReviews.flaggedStatus.description: Enter the number of times a review is flagged. If the value of the productReviews.maxFlagsCount property is reached, then this property is set to that value.

productReviews.approvedStatus.title: Approved Status
productReviews.approvedStatus.description: Enter the number of pending approvals the review has.

productReviews.pendingApprovalStatus.title: Pending Approval Status
productReviews.pendingApprovalStatus.description: The number of pending approvals the review has.

productReviews.resultsPerPage.title: Results Per Page
productReviews.resultsPerPage.description: Enter the number of product reviews displayed per page.

productReviews.maxRate.title: Max rate
productReviews.maxRate.description: Enter the maximum rating an item can receive.

productReviews.computeOverall.title: Compute Overall
productReviews.computeOverall.description: Check this box to compute and display the overall rating for the product.

productReviews.filterOptions.title: Filter Options
productReviews.filterOptions.description: The options for filtering the Product Reviews

id.title: id
id.description: The id for this filter option

name.title: name
name.description: The label for this filter option that will appear in the UI

params.title: params
params.description: a json object declaring the url parameters that defines this filter option

isDefault.title: Is Default
isDefault.description: This filter option is shown by default

productReviews.sortOptions.title: Sort Options
productReviews.sortOptions.description: The options for sorting the Product Reviews.

id.title: id
id.description: The id for this sorting option

name.title: name
name.description: The label for this sorting option that will appear in the UI

params.title: params
params.description: a json object declaring the url parameters that defines this sorting option

isDefault.title: Is Default
isDefault.description: This sorting option is shown by default

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectorByT.title: Default Selector templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectorByT.description: Default Templates to select an item option

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.facetCellBy.title: Default Facet Cell templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.facetCellBy.description: Default Templates to show item option on facets result pages

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

templateSelector.title: Selector Template
templateSelector.description: the template that will be rendered for selecting the options (Item list and PDP)

showSelectorInList.title: Show option in item lists
showSelectorInList.description: true if this option will be show in the facet results

templateFacetCell.title: Facet Cell Template
templateFacetCell.description: the template that will be used to render options on facets

quickOrder.showHyperlink.title: Show 'Quick Order' hyperlink
quickOrder.showHyperlink.description: Check this box to enable the Quick Order hyperlink.

quickOrder.textHyperlink.title: Hyperlink text
quickOrder.textHyperlink.description: Enter the text you want to use for the Quick Order hyperlink.

transactionListColumns.quote.title: Transaction list columns Quote
transactionListColumns.quote.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Purchases > Quotes.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: trandate, duedate, and total_formatted.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableQuote.title: Enable Quote columns management
transactionListColumns.enableQuote.description: Check this box to enable Quotes Columns Management.

quote.daysToExpire.title: Days to Expiration
quote.daysToExpire.description: Enter the number of days you want all quotes to remain valid after initial submittal. All quotes use the same configurable expiration, in days. After this time expires, the quote can no longer become a purchase.

quote.disclaimerSummary.title: Disclaimer summary
quote.disclaimerSummary.description: Enter the sales representative disclaimer summary that appears under the Order Summary area of the Quote Details page. This message appears if no sales representative is assigned to the quote.
quote.disclaimerSummary.default: To place the order please contact Contact Center at (000)-XXX-XXXX or send an email to xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
quote.disclaimer.description: Enter the sales representative information disclaimer that appears at the bottom of the Quote Details page. This message appears if no sales representative is assigned to the quote.
quote.disclaimer.default: For immediate assistance contact Contact Center at (000)-XXX-XXXX or send an email to xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.defaultPhone.title: Default phone for Sales Rep
quote.defaultPhone.description: Enter the default sales representative phone number. This phone number appears on the Quote Details page if a sales associate is assigned to the quote, but the phone number has not been assigned.

quote.defaultEmail.title: Default email for Sales Rep
quote.defaultEmail.description: Enter the default sales representative Email address. This email address appears on the Quote Details page if a sales associate is assigned to the quote, but the email address has not been assigned.

quoteToSalesorderWizard.invoiceFormId.title: Invoice form id
quoteToSalesorderWizard.invoiceFormId.description: Enter the Internal ID of the invoice form that SCA uses to generate a sales order using terms.

quote.purchaseReadyStatusId.title: Purchase ready status id
quote.purchaseReadyStatusId.description: Enter the Customer Status that enables a quote to be purchased. This field must match the Internal ID of the Customer Status required for that customer to be able to make a purchase from the quote.

recentlyViewedItems.useCookie.title: Use cookies for Recently Viewed Items
recentlyViewedItems.useCookie.description: Check this box to track recently viewed items with a browser cookie.

recentlyViewedItems.numberOfItemsDisplay.title: Number of displayed items
recentlyViewedItems.numberOfItemsDisplay.description: Enter the number of recently viewed items to display in the browser.

quote.showHyperlink.title: Show 'Request a Quote' hyperlink
quote.showHyperlink.description: Check this box to enable the Quote hyperlink.

quote.textHyperlink.title: Hyperlink text
quote.textHyperlink.description: Enter the text you want to use for the Quote hyperlink.

quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.title: Request a quote bottom message
quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.description: Shows an informative message when a quote is requested.
quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.default: Once your quote has been submitted, a sales representative will contact you in XX business days. For immediate assistance call us at (000)-XXX-XXXX or email us at xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.contactBusinessDaysMessage.title: Request a quote Business Days
quote.contactBusinessDaysMessage.default: A sales representative will contact you in XX business days.

transactionListColumns.returnAuthorizati.title: Transaction list columns Return Authorization
transactionListColumns.returnAuthorizati.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Purchases > Returns.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: trandate, quantity, and amount_formatted.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableReturnAutho.title: Enable Return Authorization columns management
transactionListColumns.enableReturnAutho.description: Check this box to enable Return Authorization Columns Management.

returnAuthorization.cancelUrlRoot.title: Cancel URL root
returnAuthorization.cancelUrlRoot.description: Enter a custom domain used to override the domain used to cancel a return authorization.

default.text: Quality did not meet my standards
Not as pictured on the Website

isSCISIntegrationEnabled.title: Is SCIS integration enabled
isSCISIntegrationEnabled.description: Check this box to enable SCIS integration with your SuiceCommerce Advanced site.

locationTypeMapping.store.internalid.title: Location type mapping store internal id
locationTypeMapping.store.internalid.description: Enter the location-type identifier that SuiteCommerce Advanced uses to associate a transaction with an in-store purchase. 1 = store, 2 = online

locationTypeMapping.store.name.title: Location type mapping store name
locationTypeMapping.store.name.description: Enter a descriptive text associated with the locationTypeMapping.store.internalid property.

navigationData.title: Navigation
navigationData.description:
Settings for the main navigation links like Home, Shop, etc.
Links used to construct navigation. (maxi menu and sidebar) - by default the 'Home' and 'Shop' links.

text.title: Text
text.description: Link's text shown in the UI

href.title: href
href.description: The href of the link - for example '/search' will go to the search results page. It's ignored for parent entries.  Also it could be an absolute URL like https://google.com but in that case, make sure you really need to break the single page application.

level.title: level
level.description: Hierarchy level of this navigation entry

dataTouchpoint.title: data-touchpoint
dataTouchpoint.description: data-touchpoint value for the link if any

dataHashtag.title: data-hashtag
dataHashtag.description: data-hashtag value for the link if any

classnames.title: class names
classnames.description: extra HTML class names to add to this entry

id.title: Id
id.description: Parent entries must have an id so children entries can reference it

parentId.title: Parent Id
parentId.description: If this is a child entry then this must be the id of the parent entry.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Placeholder===Cateogries will be used to render the category menu at that place.

typeahead.minLength.title: Min Length
typeahead.minLength.description: Enter the number of characters the user must enter before beginning the search.

typeahead.maxResults.title: Maximum results
typeahead.maxResults.description: Enter the maximum number of search results that are returned.

typeahead.sort.title: Sort
typeahead.sort.description: Enter the sort order of items returned by the Item Search API. By default, items are sorted by relevance in ascending order. However, you can sort by other criteria like the name property.

cache.contentPageCdn.title: Content page CDN
cache.contentPageCdn.description: Choose the CDN cache duration for content pages. Possible values are Short, Medium, and Long.

cache.contentPageTtl.title: Content page TTL
cache.contentPageTtl.description: Enter the duration of the application cache for content pages in seconds. The total value must be between 300 (5 minutes) and 7200 (2 hours).

addThis.enable.title: Enable
addThis.enable.description: Check this box to enable the AddThis sharing service.

addThis.pubId.title: Public Id
addThis.pubId.description: Enter your AddThis Profile ID here.

addThis.toolboxClass.title: Toolbox class
addThis.toolboxClass.description: This string specifies the class to be added to the AddThis Toolbox.

facebook.enable.title: Enable
facebook.enable.description: Check this box to enable the Facebook addThis sharing service.

facebook.appId.title: Application id
facebook.appId.description: Enter your custom application ID to associate the domain to your application ID.

facebook.popupOptions.status.title: Facebook popup status
facebook.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Facebook popup. Select no to disable it.

facebook.popupOptions.resizable.title: Facebook popup resizable
facebook.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Facebook popup personalbar
facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.directories.title: Facebook popup directories
facebook.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.location.title: Facebook popup location
facebook.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Facebook popup toolbar
facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.menubar.title: Facebook popup menubar
facebook.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.width.title: Facebook popup width
facebook.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.height.title: Facebook popup height
facebook.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.left.title: Facebook popup left
facebook.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.top.title: Facebook popup top
facebook.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

googlePlus.enable.title: Enable
googlePlus.enable.description: Check this box to enable the GooglePlus addThis property.

googlePlus.popupOptions.status.title: GooglePlus popup status
googlePlus.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the GooglePlus popup.

googlePlus.popupOptions.resizable.title: GooglePlus popup resizable
googlePlus.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the GooglePlus popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

googlePlus.popupOptions.scrollbars.title: GooglePlus popup scrollbars
googlePlus.popupOptions.scrollbars.description: Select yes to show scrollbars on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide them.

googlePlus.popupOptions.personalbar.title: GooglePlus popup personalbar
googlePlus.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide it.

googlePlus.popupOptions.directories.title: GooglePlus popup directories
googlePlus.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide it.

googlePlus.popupOptions.location.title: GooglePlus popup location
googlePlus.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide it.

googlePlus.popupOptions.toolbar.title: GooglePlus popup toolbar
googlePlus.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide it.

googlePlus.popupOptions.menubar.title: GooglePlus popup menubar
googlePlus.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the GooglePlus popup menu. Select no to hide it.

googlePlus.popupOptions.width.title: GooglePlus popup width
googlePlus.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the GooglePlus popup.

googlePlus.popupOptions.height.title: GooglePlus popup height
googlePlus.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the GooglePlus popup.

googlePlus.popupOptions.left.title: GooglePlus popup left
googlePlus.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the GooglePlus popup.

googlePlus.popupOptions.top.title: GooglePlus popup top
googlePlus.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the GooglePlus popup.

pinterest.enableHover.title: Enable hover
pinterest.enableHover.description: Check this box to enable the Pinterest Pin It to hover over the image.

pinterest.enableButton.title: Enable button
pinterest.enableButton.description: Check this box to enable the Pinterest PinIt button.

pinterest.imageSize.title: Image size
pinterest.imageSize.description: Enter the Pinterest image size ID to show on Pinterest.

pinterest.popupOptions.status.title: Pinterest popup status
pinterest.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.resizable.title: Pinterest popup resizable
pinterest.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the Pinterest popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

pinterest.popupOptions.scrollbars.title: Pinterest popup scrollbars
pinterest.popupOptions.scrollbars.description: Select yes to show scrollbars on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide them.

pinterest.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Pinterest popup personalbar
pinterest.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.directories.title: Pinterest popup directories
pinterest.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.location.title: Pinterest popup location
pinterest.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Pinterest popup toolbar
pinterest.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.menubar.title: Pinterest popup menubar
pinterest.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.width.title: Pinterest popup width
pinterest.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.height.title: Pinterest popup height
pinterest.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.left.title: Pinterest popup left
pinterest.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.top.title: Pinterest popup top
pinterest.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

twitter.enable.title: Enable
twitter.enable.description: Check this box to enable the Twitter addThis property.

twitter.popupOptions.status.title: Twitter popup status
twitter.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.resizable.title: Twitter popup resizable
twitter.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the Twitter popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

twitter.popupOptions.scrollbars.title: Twitter popup scrollbars
twitter.popupOptions.scrollbars.description: Select yes to show scrollbars on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide them.

twitter.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Twitter popup personalbar
twitter.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.directories.title: Twitter popup directories
twitter.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.location.title: Twitter popup location
twitter.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Twitter popup toolbar
twitter.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.menubar.title: Twitter popup menubar
twitter.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the Twitter popup menu. Select no to hide it.

twitter.popupOptions.width.title: Twitter popup width
twitter.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.height.title: Twitter popup height
twitter.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.left.title: Twitter popup left
twitter.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.popupOptions.top.title: Twitter popup top
twitter.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Twitter popup.

twitter.via.title: Twitter via
twitter.via.description: This specifies the Twitter account of the original tweeter. For example: @MerchantName.

faviconPath.title: Favicon of the Website
faviconPath.description: Add the path to the site's favicon.

subtab.title: Filter Site
subtab.description: Filter by site on Record Lists. 'all': all the sites in the account. 'current': just records under current site. 'siteIds': Array of site ids to be specified in the 'filterSiteIds' property. Current site and not related to any site records will be also considered.

filterSite.option.title: Filter Site Option
filterSite.option.description: Choose how record lists are filtered.

group.title: Multi-Domain
group.description: Multiple domains configuration. Enable it if you need to publish the same store in different languages or currencies, ugins different domains.

multiDomain.hosts.languages.title: List of languages
multiDomain.hosts.languages.description: Use the following list to add your hosts by id. In given example, not enabled by default, two different hosts has been configured one for English and dollars alone, and the other with two currencies and two languages. Important, each language must have its own domain.

host.title: Host id
host.description: The host id we are talking about in this list line

title.title: Language Title
title.description: The host language's title if non set it will use default naming or locale

multiDomain.hosts.currencies.title: List of currencies
multiDomain.hosts.currencies.description: Use the following list to add your hosts by id. In given example, not enabled by default, two different hosts has been configured one for English and dollars alone, and the other with two currencies and two languages. Important, each language must have its own domain.

host.title: Host id
host.description: The host id we are talking about in this list line

title.title: Title
title.description: The host language's title if non set it will use default naming or locale

orderShoppingFieldKeys.keys.title: Shopping's Order
orderShoppingFieldKeys.keys.description: These are the fields of Shopping's order record, a.k.a the Cart

orderShoppingFieldKeys.items.title: Shopping's Order Items
orderShoppingFieldKeys.items.description: These are the fields for each item of Shopping's order record, a.k.a the Cart

orderCheckoutFieldKeys.keys.title: Checkout's Order
orderCheckoutFieldKeys.keys.description: These are the fields for Checkout's order record

orderCheckoutFieldKeys.items.title: Checkout's Order Items
orderCheckoutFieldKeys.items.description: These are the fields for each item of Checkout's order record

suitescriptResultsPerPage.title: nlapiSearchRecord Results Per Page
suitescriptResultsPerPage.description: This integer specifies the default number of search results displayed per page. Any SuiteCommerce Advanced feature that displays search results uses this value by default.

fieldKeys.itemsFieldsAdvancedName.title: Items Fields Advanced Name
fieldKeys.itemsFieldsAdvancedName.description: This name sets the Field Set to be used when using the Item Search API to return item details.

fieldKeys.itemsFieldsStandardKeys.title: Item Fields Standard
fieldKeys.itemsFieldsStandardKeys.description: These are the fields for items in the order of SiteBuilder

extraTranslations.title: List of translations
extraTranslations.description: You can add new translations strings here or override existing ones.

storeLocator.icons.stores.title: Icons > Stores
storeLocator.icons.stores.description: Enter the URL for the store marker icon.This icon appears in the store list, next to the name of the store and in the Store Information popup (if enabled).

storeLocator.icons.position.title: Icons > Position
storeLocator.icons.position.description: Enter the URL for the store marker icon to appear on the map at the stores relative location.

storeLocator.icons.autocomplete.title: Icons > Autocomplete
storeLocator.icons.autocomplete.description: Enter the URL for the store marker icon to appear to the left of the store name within the predicted results of the auto-complete list.

storeLocator.zoomInDetails.title: Zoom level in PDP
storeLocator.zoomInDetails.description: Enter the zoom level to be applied in the map when viewing specific store details (applied in StoreLocator.Details.View.js).

storeLocator.openPopupOnMouseOver.title: Show Store popup
storeLocator.openPopupOnMouseOver.description: Check this box to enable the Store Information popup on the map when a user hovers the pointer over the associated store in the Store Locator list.

storeLocator.title.title: Title
storeLocator.title.description: Enter the title of the Store Locator feature as rendered on the main view and in the header. The default is Store Locator.

storeLocator.isEnabled.title: Is Enabled
storeLocator.isEnabled.description: Check this box to enable the Store Locator feature.

storeLocator.radius.title: Radius
storeLocator.radius.description: Enter a number to specify the search radius from the current location or entered address in which to display stores on the map. The radius units can be configured for kilometers or miles.

storeLocator.showLocalizationMap.title: Show Localization Map
storeLocator.showLocalizationMap.description: Check this box to enable a mobile-device-only search map. If this property is set to true, a small map appears at the top of the screen on mobile devices while searching for an address.

storeLocator.showAllStoresRecordsPerPage.title: Number of Stores Per Page
storeLocator.showAllStoresRecordsPerPage.description: Enter a number to specify the number of stores listed per page if a shopper selects the See Complete List of Stores link.

storeLocator.defaultTypeLocations.title: Default type of locations
storeLocator.defaultTypeLocations.description: Enter the type of stores to return (stores, warehouses, or both). If no property is specified, the map and list display both location types. 1 = stores. 2 = warehouses, blank = both

storeLocator.defaultQuantityLocations.title: Default quantity locations
storeLocator.defaultQuantityLocations.description: Enter the maximum number of locations returned if no results exist within the search radius specified using the Radius property.

storeLocator.distanceUnit.title: Distance unit
storeLocator.distanceUnit.description: Enter mi to configure the radius measurement in miles. Enter km to configure the radius measurement in kilometers.

storeLocator.apiKey.title: Google > api key
storeLocator.apiKey.description: Enter the Google-specific API key for the mapping engine.

storeLocator.mapOptions.centerPosition.l.title: Google > center position latitude
storeLocator.mapOptions.centerPosition.l.description: Enter a number to specify the default Google-specific latitude position (as a string) to center the map when geolocation is disabled.

storeLocator.mapOptions.centerPosition.l.title: Google > center position longitude
storeLocator.mapOptions.centerPosition.l.description: Enter a number to specify the default Google-specific longitude position (as a string) to center the map when geolocation is disabled.

storeLocator.mapOptions.zoom.title: Google > zoom level
storeLocator.mapOptions.zoom.description: Enter a number to specify the Google-specific default map zoom level.

storeLocator.mapOptions.mapTypeControl.title: Google > mapTypeControl
storeLocator.mapOptions.mapTypeControl.description: Check this box to display the Google-specific Map Type Control in the upper left corner of the map.

storeLocator.mapOptions.streetViewContro.title: Google > streetViewControl
storeLocator.mapOptions.streetViewContro.description: Check this box to display the Google-specific Street View Pegman icon. The Pegman icon is a Google-specific control that can be dragged onto the map to enable Street View.

storeLocator.mapOptions.mapTypeId.title: Google > mapTypeId
storeLocator.mapOptions.mapTypeId.description: Enter the Google-specific default map type. Options include: roadmap, satellite, hybrid, and terrain.

group.title: Tracking Services
group.description: Configure tracking services like Analytics and Tag Manager

ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectedByT.title: Default Selected templates by item option Type
ItemOptions.defaultTemplates.selectedByT.description: Default Templates to show a selected item option

type.title: Option Type
type.description: The type of the option or the string default

templateSelected.title: Selected Template
templateSelected.description: the template that will be rendered for the item in the cart (Cart and Cart confirmation)
